WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
 
The request:
Find an dynamic attached device and communicate to it.
 
The problem:
A problem raise @ work that took a bunch of people to investigate. We got a device intalled with correct driver but we wrote a program to communicate to it as the one that cames with didn't suit our needs. Despite all the documentation no one in the Team could help in C#. As we have the chipset and the documentation of it, we are now thinking to write a very basic driver ourselves.
 
Regards,
cpg
